name: Jun & Gloom: Project Orangewood
description:
This is a proof of concept. These are new characters. This is my first horror game. Please be gentle.

Jun and her co-paranormal-investigator Gloom are trying to get to the bottom of a story. They are following reports of strange goings on in a boring suburban town called Orangewood. 

CONTROLS:  

  • ASDW to move
  • Shift to crouch(sneak)
  • Mouse look
  • Scroll wheel - open/close eyelids

NOTES:

The Monster is attracted to Light, Sound as well as being SEEN! If you let it get too close, you'll have to quickly turn OFF your flashlight, Freeze your movement and scroll-wheel to close your eyes!

Since this is the earliest of Alpha builds, there will be bugs. This is only in proof of concept state.
